javadoc:
Wrapper for a KeyStroke that will get saved as a property in an Options
 object.

methods.javadoc: Construct a wrapper object using the given KeyStroke.
methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Construct a wrapper object using the given KeyStroke.

methods.javadoc:
Read the components for a Key Stroke from the given
 SaveState object to restore this WrappedKeyStroke.
methods.name: readState
methods.comment:
Read the components for a Key Stroke from the given
 SaveState object to restore this WrappedKeyStroke.

methods.javadoc:
Write the components for the wrapped Key Stroke to the given 
 SaveState object.
methods.name: writeState
methods.comment:
Write the components for the wrapped Key Stroke to the given 
 SaveState object.

name: WrappedKeyStroke
comment:
Wrapper for a KeyStroke that will get saved as a property in an Options
